channel.title: PvP area help plz [317]

item.title: PvP area help plz [317]
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

I am trying to make everywhere except for the edgeville bank a PvP area. How do I accomplish this…this is the code so far.

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if ((absX > 3089)return true;

return false;
}

there was more code before but all the coordinates seemed to not work with eachother.

| |
| |

if that is the bank, I would first say any where below the bottom line or anywhere above the top line, but then both wouldn’t even register. help…

Read full topic
